# Aura-IDToken LLM Configuration
User-agent: *
Disallow:

# Project Context
Name: Aura-IDToken
Type: Decentralized Identity Protocol (DID)
Network: Aura Network (Cosmos SDK Layer 1)
Consensus: Tendermint BFT
Privacy: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP), Behavioral Biometrics

# Core Concepts
- Sybil Resistance: Implements Eigen Trust algorithm for reputation scoring.
- Verification: Supports W3C Verifiable Credentials (VCs).
- Interoperability: IBC-enabled for cross-chain identity.
- Philosophy: Computable Trust & Digital Stoicism.

# Key Resources
Documentation: https://docs.aura-idtoken.network
Whitepaper: https://aura-idtoken.network/whitepaper.pdf
Source Code: https://github.com/Kamil1230xd/aura-sign-mvp
Explorer: https://aurascan.io

# Technical Architecture
- Core Engine: TrustMath (BSL 1.1)
- SDKs: TypeScript/React (MIT)
- Protection: Aura Protection Suite v1.0
